TopicTitle: ALL IVA Rendezvous and Docking Tutorial

Articles.Content:
I made a video showing how to perform an ALL-IVA Rendezvous and Docking. The YouTube annotations provide tips and insights, but may not fully qualify as a "tutorial".

IVA-ONLY Rendezvous and Docking is only possible (in my opinion) with the [ALCOR capsule](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/54925-1-0-2-ALCOR-Advanced-Landing-Capsule-for-Orbital-Rendezvous-by-ASET-%2805-05-2015%29/page76?highlight=instructions) which requires [RasterPropMonitor](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117471). I finish the docking with [Docking Port Alignment Indicator.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/43901-0-23-5-Docking-Port-Alignment-Indicator-%28Version-3-1-Updated-05-08-14%29?highlight=navyfish) This is optional, but I never leave home without it.

So if you're interested in ALL-IVA missions, (like I am) then you may find this video helpful.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/TqL3Y9158QA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

There's an

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/x_wuLl_18yg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 also on my channel.
Thanks to

Alexustas for making ALCOR

MOARdV for keeping Raster Prop Monitor updated and integrating new features.

and NavyFish for Docking Port Alignment Indicator

P.S. I'm still learning how to make videos, so don't expect Scott Manley Quality. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
